item.title: [PI] Dialogue option, is looping? and not resetting all stats, but only some?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

I recently added a prestige system, everythign worked and compiled out just fine, but one thing.
When you click “yes im sure I want to prestige” It prestiges you 10 times, when it is only supposed to prestige you once. and it only resets some stats.

Here is the dialogue action code i am using.

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 346) { for (int i = 0; i <21; i++) { if (c.playerLevel[i] == 99 && c.prestige < 10) { c.playerLevel[i] = 1; c.playerXP[i] = 0; c.playerLevel[3] = 10; c.playerXP[3] = 1155; c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.prestige += 1; c.prestigeTokens += 3; c.sendMessage("Congradulations! You are now " + c.prestige + " prestige and have " + c.prestigeTokens + " Prestige tokens!"); } }

What is wrong with this code? It prestiges you 10 times, and only reset some stats. not all of them.
